name: SageTalk
_source: s;GenericMage;Have you heard tale of the king's illness?
s;GenericMage;I seek to assure you, sire, that they are that-|merely tales.
s;GenericMage;Indeed, indeed.{w} Ne'er-do-wells seek to demean the king!|But the poor decisions made last season were the fault of advisors,|and they have been duly executed?
s;GenericMage;The order to plant corn, the increased conscription,|really, anything!
s;GenericMage;The Trojan bloodline is healthy, sir.|I simply must ensure you know that.
